attributes.additional_details:
MP's have abused their right to claim expenses for decades.
MP's are allowed to claim for a second property even if its a mortgage. Then free to sell the property and keep all the monies.
MP's can claim for a variety of things that no other employee would pay for.
Its not their money, it belongs to the tax payer. We should decide how MP's are paid.
Remember "We are all in it together"
